page.title: 15FOOD AND DRINK IN FORFAR
page.content: In Forfar we have lots of companies who make or sell food & drink.{Soft {drinks}and spring water are produced by Strathmore Springs of West High St. beside the Police Station.They bottle their products, pack them into crates or boxes and sell them to different stores and shops all over Britain. Sometimes a lorry comes round the streets selling direct to customers. The firm has lots of machines and lorries.The machines fill the bottles with concentrated syrup,water and carbon dioxide gas to give the fizz. The lorries transport the juice around this country and export it abroad.
